alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Coastal Bay; Gadsden; Inland Bay; Inland Gulf; Jackson; Liberty; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 4:06PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of south central Jackson, northwestern Gulf, Bay and Calhoun Counties in the Panhandle of Florida, southern Gadsden, northern Liberty Counties in Big Bend of Florida and southeastern Washington Counties in the Panhandle of Florida through 530 PM EDT/430 PM CDT/... At 406 PM EDT/306 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles southwest of Marianna to 26 miles southwest of Panama City Beach. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Panama City, Lynn Haven, Panama City Beach, Callaway, Blountstown, Midway, Quincy, Springfield, Greensboro, Hiland Park, Stonemill Creek, Tyndall Air Force Base, Wewahitchka, Orange, Parker, Bristol, Altha, Rock Bluff, Moose Pond and Clarksville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM EDT/600 PM CDT/ for Big Bend of and the Panhandle of Florida.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Coastal Bay; Gadsden; Inland Bay; Inland Gulf; Jackson; Liberty; Washington
